name: Towsif Muhtadi Khan
description: I am a Frontend Developer and UI/Graphics Designer, focused on creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces that blend functionality and aesthetics. My passion lies in delivering seamless, user-centric digital experiences.
aboutMe: I am a Computer Science graduate specializing in frontend development and UI/graphics design. With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I create responsive, user-friendly interfaces that blend functionality with aesthetics. My passion for UI/UX design helps me craft visually appealing digital experiences, ensuring a seamless user journey. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams, merging design and development to deliver high-quality web applications. I'm continuously learning and striving to push the boundaries of design and technology.

experiences.description: As a Frontend Engineer at Sense n Respond Software LLC, I specialize in frontend development, ensuring seamless functionality and precise fulfillment of project requirements.
At CPSD Technologies Ltd. in Chere, I am committed to developing my skills as a Junior Web Developer, focusing on crafting robust and user-friendly digital solutions.

projects.title: Furniture Fusion (Landing Page)
projects.description: Furniture Fusion is a dynamic and visually appealing web application built using React JS and Tailwind CSS. This project showcases the fusion of innovative design and functionality, offering users an immersive experience in the furniture world.

projects.title: Event Details Website
projects.description: This website offers an interactive platform for visualizing event data through dynamic charts and graphs. Users can easily analyze key metrics, track event trends, and gain valuable insights, making it an essential tool for event organizers and attendees alike.
